txt.en: 'It seems as though anyone who encounters the goblins and manages to escape finds their coin purses much lighter than they were previously.\n\n'In fact, my own coin purse is a bit lighter now. I would appreciate if you could go in there and take back the goods that were stolen from the innocent travellers passing through here.'

'Well, look here! I always suspected those goblins were thieves and worse! Thank you for bringing these back to the side of the dwarves; I will make sure these coins find their way back to their owners.'
'The missing coins will surely be found on those goblins, or I'm no dwarf!'
Several coin purses have gone missing from travellers who had encounters with the Snaga-maudhûl goblins.
Reclaim the stolen coins of the dwarves ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The goblin-thieves can be found in Snaga-maudhûl, in the western area of the Great Delving.\n\nYou should reclaim the coins of dwarf-travellers that have been stolen by the waylaying goblins.
Bring the coins you recovered to Wegil
Wegil can be found on the north-east side of Snaga-maudhûl in the Great Delving.\n\nYou should bring the coins you recovered to Wegil.
